metadata.title: CVE-2017-9992 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the decode_dds1 function in libavcodec/dfa.cin FFmpeg before 2.8.12, 3.0.x before 3.0.8, 3.1.x before 3.1.8, 3.2.xbefore 3.2.5, and 3.3.x before 3.3.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
